subject: re:Top listed drugs for you
body:
Dear valued member.
You have an excellent opportunity to save money purchasing your products.
We supply our customers with affordable and safe Canadian products which are of the same quality as American drugs. 
For more information click herehttp://boyview.hk
Strict confidentiality is guaranteed.We are proud of our experienced and professional team, prompt service and safe delivery.
Sincerely yours,Amy Connors
